blog.name: suppermariobroth
blog.title: Supper Mario Broth
blog.description: A Super Mario variety blog. Screenshots, photos, sprites, gifs, scans and more from all around the world of Super Mario Bros.

summary: Top: Mario’s house as seen during gameplay in Paper Mario. The sign above the door reads “Mario”. Middle: The house appears...
caption:
Top: Mario’s house as seen during gameplay in Paper Mario. The sign above the door reads “Mario”.
Middle: The house appears during the last scene of the credits, where the sign is different, but the lighting is too dark to see properly.
Bottom left: Zooming in on the entrance.
Bottom right: Adjusting the brightness and contrast, we can see that the sign actually says “Mario’s” exclusively during this scene. It is possible that this is an older design which was not updated when the in-game model was changed and remained in this state due to being too hard to see.
Main Blog | Twitter | Patreon | Store | Small Findings | Source: twitter.com user “villomaru”

blog.name: dlmisadventures
blog.title: Dark Link's Misadventures
blog.description:
To Dark Link, humbly accepting defeat at the hands of the Hero of Time is for the worms. With his homcidal fairy companion in tow, watch his series of epic fails in his conquest for victory against his heroic half as he misadventures within the remains of Ganondorf's empire.
PG-13 By Nixie Douglas / Parallel Foxii

title: GAME UK OFFERING PIN SET PREORDER BONUS WITH CRASH TEAM RACING: NITRO-FUELED
body: GAME in the UK has revealed their preorder bonus for Crash Team Racing: Nitro-Fueled. No matter what version of the game you get, your preorder will come with a special Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled pin set. You can grab your preorder here.

blog.title: Nintendo lover

summary: LIGHTSEEKERS GETS A MAJOR CONTENT UPDATE
title: LIGHTSEEKERS GETS A MAJOR CONTENT UPDATE
body:
The Lightseekers dev team promised a large update for the game in May, and they’ve already delivered. The game’s latest update is now live, and you can get the full details on it below.

Our latest Uprising update is here, and it’s our biggest one yet!

Today we bring 202 cards to the digital version of Lightseekers with UPRISING, available all versions of Lightseekers: Nintendo Switch, Mobile and Steam.

You can find a full list of the cards on our card database here and see the main features of Uprising on our Uprising Overview page here. In addition, the Nintendo Switch now has full joy con support!

In addition, the brand new single player ADVENTURE MODE is now available. With 200 stages of story-driven content, this is a major new mode that will bring dozens of hours of new content to Lightseekers. You can find out more about Adventure Mode, our previous news post has you covered.

Not only that, but we are also bringing DRAFT MODE to Lightseekers. This new competitive mode will allow for completely random deck builds with huge prizes for those who manage to run the gauntlet undefeated.

All of these new features make this the biggest Lightseekers update we’ve ever done. We really hope you enjoy the new content in Uprising!

There are some additional smaller gameplay updates and rule changes that are included in this release:

– You can now silence emotes from other players
– The front page of Lightseekers has been updated to include news and other useful information
– Once-per-game abilities can no longer be triggered by other cards’ effects. For example, Dusktalon Assassin cannot trigger Star Tamer Calak’s ability.
– Cards that trigger abilities’ effects no longer count as ‘using’ that ability. For example, if Dusktalon Assassin triggers an ability, that won’t trigger cards like Abyss Tentacle.
– A Burn card can no longer be Restarted or Rotated backwards by other cards.
– Hammerdown Enforcer is replacing the Crazed Bomber card, more details on this change and it’s reasoning can be found here.

title: Working Software Titles
body:
I find working in Photoshop the closest thing to therapy. Once I have an idea, I can make something happen. Here are some dumb ideas I made:

From the team that brought you Wario Teaches Money Laundering comes follow up to the classic hit Get Off Waluigi’s Lawn! 2. Those pesky kids are back , and you have to make sure Waluigi doesn’t get a citation from his Home Owners Association.

“Get off…

summary: Atsushi Inaba de PlatinumGames está encantado con el trato con Nintendo y el éxito de Nintendo Switch
title: Atsushi Inaba de PlatinumGames está encantado con el trato con Nintendo y el éxito de Nintendo Switch
body:
Atsushi Inaba de PlatinumGames está encantado con el trato con Nintendo y el éxito de Nintendo Switch

Siempre que hablamos de PlatinumGames hay un nombre que se nos viene a la cabeza y es el de Hideki Kamiya, pero hay otro nombre que suele ser olvidado y no deberíamos de hacerlo. Y es que a sombra de nuestro calvito borde favorito es muy alargada pero la luz que proyecta Atsushi Inaba provoca una sombra bastante similar a la de Kamiya. La trayectoria de Inaba ha sido una de esas que son dignas de…

View On WordPress
